meanings.definition: The quality of being able to stick to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The stickiness of the tape made it easy to attach the paper to the wall.
meanings.sent2: I had to wash my hands multiple times to get rid of the stickiness from the spilled syrup.
meanings.sent3: The stickiness of the glue caused a funny situation when my hands got stuck together.
meanings.sent4: The stickiness of the situation made it hard to move forward, like being trapped in quicksand.
meanings.sent5: The stickiness of the honey on the spoon was so strong that it took a while to clean it off completely.

meanings.definition: The state of being sticky or adhesive.
meanings.sent1: The stickiness of the tape made it easy to attach the paper to the wall.
meanings.sent2: I had to wash my hands multiple times to get rid of the stickiness from the spilled syrup.
meanings.sent3: The stickiness of the situation made it hard to move forward, like being trapped in quicksand.
meanings.sent4: The stickiness of the glue caused a funny situation when my hands got stuck together.
meanings.sent5: The stickiness of the honey on the spoon was so strong that it took a while to clean it off completely.
